DOC.brief_summary: This study involve one-time , web-based quantitative structure self-complete ( `` web-based '' ) survey subject qualitative semi-structured ( `` qualitative '' ) interview select sub-sample subject evaluate consent process association research outcomes , specifically early adherence Pre-exposure Prophylaxis ( PrEP ) Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) seroconversion point participation ATN 110 ATN 113 study .
DOC.detailed_description: Decisional autonomy foundational , nearly inviolable principle contemporary human subject research . `` Autonomy '' refers deliberative outcome reflect individual 's choice , outside control influence agent . From perspective research participation decision-making , autonomy incorporates five element consent : competence ; disclosure ; understanding ; voluntariness ; , consent . Adequate research consent process think challenge group-level quality define `` vulnerable population '' need protection coercion undue influence . Age ( typically less age 18 United States ) widely accept status-defining vulnerability . Sexual minority identity same-sex behavior define `` vulnerable '' population 45 Code Federal Regulations ( CFR ) 46 subpart A ( Common Rule ) allow appropriate protection vulnerable population determine individual Institutional Review Board ( IRB ) . The specific aim study address issue within large domain question primacy decisional autonomy , association autonomous research consent subsequent participation-associated outcome . This mixed-methods study enroll young men sex men ( YMSM ) transgender woman sex men currently previously enrol ATN 110 ATN 113 study . Data web-based survey use test hypotheses relationship participant age , element consent process , two key participation outcome ( early adherence PrEP , HIV seroconversion ) ATN 110 ATN 113 study . Data qualitative interview use explore depth age-related vulnerability disclosure vulnerability manifest participant whether/how influence ATN 110 ATN 113 study outcome . The interview also assess decisional support benefit harm associate participation .
DOC.criteria: To consider eligible enrollment ATN 137 , individual must meet criterion list . Is currently previously enrol ATN 110 ATN 113 study ; Is willing able provide inform consent via online inform consent form ( ICF ) . To consider eligible enrollment , individual must meet criterion list . Prematurely discontinue ATN 110 ATN 113 study due withdrawal consent inadvertent enrollment .
